title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and library for downloading, running and managing large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, push models via simple Python calls.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter letting you use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user) installable via Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client SDK wrapping Ollama’s REST endpoints with fluent builder syntax.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Lightweight Ruby gem for chatting and managing models through a local Ollama server.

title: ollama-cli (go-llama)
summary: Community Go CLI wrapping Ollama endpoints with cobra commands and model file helpers.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local AI code completion powered by any Ollama model.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client library with strongly-typed request/response models for Ollama.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Python template repo showing Retrieval-Augmented Generation with Ollama + ChromaDB.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama server onto Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama replies into threads; supports custom system prompts per guild.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets users chat with local models privately or in channels.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger module for CI pipelines that spins up Ollama containers and runs model tests.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async client and typed structs for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI that connects to Ollama; includes conversation history export and prompt templates.
